article_title: Republicans Put Forward Their Alternative To Obamacare
article_text:
Since it was first introduced, Republicans have had a lot of bad things to say about the Affordable Care Act. The main criticism of their criticism has always been, well, do you have a better idea? Well, now the apparently do.

On Monday, Sen. Bill Cassidy and Rep. Pete Sessions rolled out what theyre calling the "Worlds Greatest Healthcare Plan," saying that it fixes 25 of Obamacares biggest problems. The caveat to all this of course, is nobody may be listening. Presumptive nominee Donald Trump has his own ideas, and House Speaker Paul Ryan has his own task force looking into the problem. But perhaps its a start.

ABC's Karen Travers joined us from Washington D.C.

article_metadata.keywords: republicans, put, forward, their, alternative, to, obamacare
article_metadata.description: Since it was first introduced, Republicans have had a lot of bad things to say about the Affordable Care Act

article_summary:
Since it was first introduced, Republicans have had a lot of bad things to say about the Affordable Care Act.
The main criticism of their criticism has always been, well, do you have a better idea?
Presumptive nominee Donald Trump has his own ideas, and House Speaker Paul Ryan has his own task force looking into the problem.
ABC's Karen Travers joined us from Washington D.C.
On Monday, Sen. Bill Cassidy and Rep. Pete Sessions rolled out what theyre calling the "Worlds Greatest Healthcare Plan," saying that it fixes 25 of Obamacares biggest problems.
